name: TDJakesSermons
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: t. d. jakes sermons
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Potter's Touch, a weekly program, with Bishop T.D. Jakes, tackles today's topics and confronts the hidden issues and invisible scars that go untreated. This broadcast carries healing and restoration into homes of hurting people, unearthing taboo topics and offering practical and spiritual solutions to life's toughest questions.

Once enabled, you can listen to the most recent episode by saying, "Alexa, play TD Jakes Sermons."

To pause or resume any episode, say "Alexa, pause" or "Alexa, resume." To listen to previous episodes, say "Alexa, play the previous episode." If you want to know the title of an episode while the episode is playing, say "Alexa, ask TD Jakes Sermons for the title of this episode." If you want to know the air date of an episode, say "Alexa, ask TD Jakes Sermons for the date of this episode."
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
